title: Read the concern Planning Authority / Special Planning Authority constituted under relevant Acts instead Collector, wherever applicable (1) except the powers to grant Letter of Intent under Regulation No
clause_text: Read the concern Planning Authority / Special Planning Authority constituted under relevant Acts instead Collector, wherever applicable (1) except the powers to grant Letter of Intent under Regulation No.14.1.1.5.
